long_description: Roam the countryside or tour the city while enjoying the comfortable coverage of the REI women's Journey Hat. Cotton hat with ribbon band features a 3.25 in. brim to shade your eyes and face. Built-in UPF 45 sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Inner polyester headband keeps sweat out of your eyes. REI women's Journey Hat includes a chin strap to keep hat in place.
short_description: Roam the countryside or tour the city while enjoying the comfortable coverage of the REI women's Journey Hat.
